com.myscript.atk.mltw.model.listeners

Interface OnAutoScrollListener


  • public interface OnAutoScrollListener
    Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked when the widget is automatically scrolling.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAutoScroll(int y)
      Called when an auto scroll event is processing.
      void onAutoScrollEnd(int y)
      Called when an auto scroll event has ended.
      void onAutoScrollStart(int y)
      Called when an auto scroll event is about to start.

    • Method Detail

      • onAutoScrollStart

        void onAutoScrollStart(int y)
        Called when an auto scroll event is about to start.
        Parameters:
        y - The current y position of the widget.

      • onAutoScroll

        void onAutoScroll(int y)
        Called when an auto scroll event is processing.
        Parameters:
        y - The current y position of the widget.

      • onAutoScrollEnd

        void onAutoScrollEnd(int y)
        Called when an auto scroll event has ended.
        Parameters:
        y - The current y position of the widget.
